title: CFTC Kicks Off Review of Kalshi's Congressional Control Prediction Markets
description: The U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission began a formal review and public comment period to evaluate prediction market Kalshi's proposed contracts to bet on who will control Congress.

title: US Government Pays $51,600 for $300 Trash Can As American Debt Crosses $32,000,000,000,000: Report
description:
The U.S. Department of Defense has paid $51,600 to the aerospace giant Boeing for a $300 trash receptacle, according to a new report from an American think tank. The Pentagon paid the staggering sum after the trash container became designated as a non-commercial item, reports Responsible Statecraft, which is the online magazine for the Quincy […]
